reason_or_context: Hit by a passing train while crossing tracks at Patia railway station after returning from a funeral.
One of the fatalities reported in the rain-induced disaster that struck Dehradun; part of the rising toll during continuing rescue operations.
Scooter rider rammed by a speeding car on NH-24 Manglam Cut flyover, fell off flyover and died; driver fled the scene.
Indian national shot dead by police in Santa Clara, California; family alleges delayed notification and seeks probe.
One of three herders (Dinu Ram) found dead while grazing livestock on the Shrikhand route; bodies discovered at a camping site.

Vaibhav Gaikwad was one of three people swept away in flood-affected areas; body recovered after 48 hours.

Sudarshan Ghonshetti found dead after going missing while fishing during heavy rain-swollen rivers; body recovered after 48 hours.
Decomposed body of a youth found in a village pond; police registered murder case and circulated physical details.
Lawyer Kamla Yadav shot dead by his elder brother (a retired sub-inspector) after a family/property dispute; accused absconding.
Missing 9-year-old girl who had been missing for five days was found dead in the Coast Canal; police suspect murder.
